subject: Question about HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hello, I was wondering about the shipping date/release date of the shifter.
I have ordered it since 12 December.I was wondering what process it is in.
Order #SSN4768

Kinds Regards,
Thanaphat

conversations.body_text: Hi Thanaphat Mongkollak,  The HS Pro is expected to be shipped between December 20 and 22.

Hello,

Sounds good, thanks for the update

Kind regards,

Thanaphat

On Sat, Dec 20, 2025 at 2:21 PM service@simsonn.com
